tha-ap119:5.1: Otataṃ vitthataṃ → ogataṃ vitataṃ (s2, s3) | otataṃ vitataṃ (pts1)
tha-ap119:5.2: suvicittavaṭaṃsakaṃ → suci cittaṃ papañcakaṃ (si, s2, s3) | suvicittaṃ vaṭaṃsakaṃ (pts1)
tha-ap119:7.3: Pāṇabhūte → pāṇabhūnaṃ (s2, s3, mr) | pāṇabhūtaṃ (si, s2, s3, pts1)
tha-ap119:9.4: caritaṃ → karitaṃ (si, s2, s3) | kāritaṃ (si, pts1, mr)
